${ModID}:BookOfIndex.NAME: Book of the Index
${ModID}:BookOfIndex.FLAVOR: My own will is erroneous. Only the Prescript can lead me to the right path.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every turn, a random #yPrescript is generated. If you complete it, you gain [E] next turn.
The %s card played this turn is

${ModID}:BookOfRCorp.NAME: Book of R Corp
${ModID}:BookOfRCorp.FLAVOR: Many came before me. Many will come after me.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, add a #yClone to your hand.
